New East Wing Episode with Dave Rupert

By Tim Smith · August 13th, 2012

Last week, we recorded with Dave Rupert of Paravel, the ATX Web Show and ShopTalk Show. I had the chance to meet him at this years Front-End Design Conference and he's a really awesome dude.

Interested in working with me?
